views.createSql:
CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT
        threads.thread_id,
        threads.thread_no,
        threads.last_modified,
        COUNT(postIds.post_id) as posts_count
    FROM 
        chan_post_id postIds
    LEFT JOIN chan_post posts
        ON posts.chan_post_id = postIds.post_id
    LEFT JOIN chan_thread threads 
        ON postIds.owner_thread_id = threads.thread_id
    WHERE 
        posts.is_op = 0
    GROUP BY threads.thread_id
    HAVING posts_count >= 0
    ORDER BY threads.last_modified ASC

CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT 
        thread_id,
        thread_no,
        last_modified,
        COUNT(threads.thread_id) AS posts_count
    FROM 
        chan_thread threads
    LEFT JOIN chan_post_id postIds
        ON threads.thread_id = postIds.owner_thread_id
    GROUP BY threads.thread_id
    HAVING posts_count <= 1
    ORDER BY threads.last_modified ASC
